attr.title: Lawn Buster for Hire
attr.desc: Play as Lawn Buster and trim the grass in randomly generated lawn levels while following an increasingly complex series of rules and priorities.
attr.inst: You can purchase Lawn Buster for Hire at: https://turdboomerang.itch.io/lawn-buster-for-hire. Download the *Lawn Buster for Hire.zip* and extract it, and place the *Lawn Buster for Hire.exe* file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with the *Lawn Buster for Hire.zip*, Mar 01, 2022 release.
